name: Josh Hudson | Fort Lytton | Shire
description:
A recreation of Fort Lytton located in Brisbane, Australia.  Explore the themed recreation and discover what secrets the Shire has to offer through a unique VR experience.  

"Frodo mentioned something about a secret ring,  It wouldn't hurt to check it out..."

This title features an intractable VR environment designed with all headsets in mind and will not work without one.
